sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Remove update_synch from adt_execution</description>
        <name>adt_execution_remove_update_synch</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[		removeUpdateSynchAttribute('adt_execution');
		removeCustomUpdates('adt_execution_');
		removeVersions('adt_execution_');

		function removeUpdateSynchAttribute(table) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
			gr.addQuery('name', table);
			gr.addNullQuery('element');
			gr.query();
			if (!gr.next())
				return;

			var attributes = gr.attributes + '';
			if (attributes.indexOf('update_synch') >= 0) {
				attributes = stripAttribute(attributes, 'update_synch');

				gr.attributes = attributes;
				gr.setWorkflow(false);
				gr.update();
				gs.print("Updated " + table + " attributes to [" + attributes + "]");
			} else {
				gs.print("No update_synch attribute found for " + table + ".  Leaving as [" + attributes + "]");
			}
		}

		function stripAttribute(attributes, stripme) {
			var attrs = attributes.split(",");
			var stripmeIdx = attrs.indexOf(stripme);
			attrs.splice(stripmeIdx,1);
			return attrs.join();
		}

		function removeCustomUpdates(prefix) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_update_xml');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'STARTSWITH', prefix);
			gr.setWorkflow(false);
			gr.deleteMultiple();
		}

		function removeVersions(prefix) {
			var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_update_version');
			gr.addQuery('name', 'STARTSWITH', prefix);
			gr.setWorkflow(false);
			gr.deleteMultiple();
		}]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2020-04-14 11:29:31</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>26f4e92f5fc8101059436e303e4666e8</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>adt_execution_remove_update_synch</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Application Diagnostics Tool" source="com.snc.app_diagnostics_tool">822052ab47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4382</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_26f4e92f5fc8101059436e303e4666e8</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2020-04-14 15:46:34</sys_updated_on>
        <unloadable>false</unloadable>
    </sys_script_fix>
</record_update>
